slide.title: Military personnel control traffic on Dhaka-Chittagong highway, , in the capital's Jatrabari area yesterday.Photo: Sk Enamul Haq
Police search the bag of a passenger, on a BRTC bus before it left Kamalapur depot yesterday. Photo: Sk Enamul Haq
In the wake of political violence and blockades, the government has ordered operation of the state-run buses under police protetion. Photo: Sk Enamul Haq

People ride a battery-run rickshaw van on Dhaka-Chittagong highway at Shanir Akhra yesterday during the opposition's 83-hour blockade. These vans are prone to accident, especially on highways due to their slow speed. Photo: Enamul Haq
